name: places/ChIJc1ZL2CBZwokRuR1sEDuxA6A
formattedAddress: 303 E 83rd St Suite 15B, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 303 E 83rd St Suite 15B, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: This is one of the best rare gems in the upper east side neighborhood. I happened upon this store and immediately was taken by all the wonderful treasures and beautiful decor items. I absolutely adore Colin, who is incredibly professional, personable, and has an exceptional design vison and great advice. Melissa is the owner who is so delightful, and carries such an incredible array of beautiful things. I absolutely love this store.

originalText.text:
I love this store. Everything they have is absolute perfection. I just found them recently and have made quite a few fantastic purchases. Not only do they have wonderful things, their customer service is top notch.

I've dealt with Colin twice now, and he is superb. The first time I got an email from them offering a discount on my next order. Of course I didn't see the email until after I had placed my order, so I responded with a request for a refund, and without hesitation he gave it to me.

The second time I unfortunately received a damaged item. I had thrown the packaging away by the time I realized it was broken, so I had no proof it came that way. Being the stand up people they are, they shipped a replacement again without a problem.

I fully applaud the quality and integrity of the products and people from Luxe Curations and plan on spending lots of money with them!

originalText.text: I visited the store a few weeks ago for a reception the store was hosting and I was truly blown away with the high quality of unique and exclusive products found within. The team that welcomed us into the store (Colin) was incredibly kind, generous and helpful, and really gave that personal touch that I'm looking for in a shopping experience. I was impressed with the expansive knowledge that he had and was able to share with me, as someone less knowledgeable about the world of design. Would highly recommend visiting when in the UES.

originalText.text: This is a lovely store, and Colin, the gentleman who helped us out, is a real gem. My wife and I came in looking to find inspiration to furnish our new apartment, and he really took the time to understand our space, and to show us plenty of things that got our brains working. It was a level of service that we really haven't gotten anywhere else, and it's why we'll continue to come to Luxe in the future.

text.text: This is a lovely store, and Colin, the gentleman who helped us out, is a real gem. My wife and I came in looking to find inspiration to furnish our new apartment, and he really took the time to understand our space, and to show us plenty of things that got our brains working. originalText.text:
Really a mishmash of items. A lot of seashells and beach things which would be unusual for New York City apartments. There was a lovely girl working there. She was brand new and nothing that I was interested in had a price on it. She had to take pictures of the items I  wanted  and send it to the owner. Wasted a lot of time waiting for an answer. Being in retail myself it’s always been my thought that if you hire help every item should be priced. I thought the prices were a bit high for the quality.
I wish them luck but I would not be going back.
